name: immerse
content:
immerse yourself in something

to become completely involved in something: She got some books out of the library and immersed herself in Jewish history and culture.
See more
[ T ] formal to put something or someone completely under the surface of a liquid: be immersed in The shells should be immersed in boiling water for two minutes.
